segments.text: There's so much happening in this one kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My attention is drawn to the woman, so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But how can she not see the water flowing over the sink's edge?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a sizable puddle on the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry about someone slipping and falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Especially with the children engaged in their precarious act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is very brave, or perhaps just very hungry, to climb like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is patiently waiting, full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; it gives me a jolt of concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous situation that she remains completely unaware of.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out a warning to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm just an observer, watching this silent play unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out alright in the end.
segments.speaker: PAR
